attributes.action: lead the way to act with compassion and ask the greek goverment why they are breaking e.u. law with regards to there animal welfare.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dogs in greece for the past few months have been hanged,poisoned,beaten to death and left to die on streets in greece and also dogs are negleted with no food and water,cats and other animals are also abused.to make way for tourist in the summer,so they kill them of so they wont bother tourist..please make a compassionate choice and lets put a end to this horrible act thankyou..

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Greek Government and suggest you petition them directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
